item.title: Streamline Security Operations and Management with Trend Micro - Cloud One
item.description: In this workshop, youâ€™ll learn how to leverage Cloud One - Workload Security to enforce the detection and protection policy (application control, anti-malware, Hosted IDS/IPS, firewall, integrity monitoring, and log inspection) via a small software component deployed on each instance being protected.
